step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands in your lap. Keep your elbows relaxed.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a great stretch for your chest and shoulders.
You held the stretch effectively. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
You're returning to the start position smoothly. Well done on completing the repetitions.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! You successfully clasped your hands, raised them, and spread your elbows wide. Keep up the good work with these movements to help your lymph flow and flexibility.
